author: ddas
msg: Merge -r 759931:759932 from trunk onto 0.20 branch. Fixes HADOOP-5473.

author: davsclaus
msg: MR-157: Better re connect if not connected to mail store, eg catching exception that some mail server throws despite the API should just return a boolean.

author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-5473. Solves a race condition in killing a task - the state is KILLED if there is a user request pending to kill the task and the TT reported the state as SUCCESS. Contributed by Amareshwari Sriramadasu.

author: davsclaus
msg: MR-157: Better re connect if not connected to mail store, eg catching exception that some mail server throws despite the API should just return a boolean.
